g.text: shows list of employee roles and requests selection (role)
requests data (name, address, phoneNumber, email, citizenCardNumber)
createEmployee(name, address, phoneNumber, email, citizenCardNumber, role)
emp=createEmployee(name, address, phoneNumber, email, citizenCardNumber, role)
create(name, address, phoneNumber, email, citizenCardNumber, role)
shows all data and requests confirmation
